item.title: Part I: Create sound driven animations. With Cavalry.
item.description: This is the first part of a series I am calling “Sound Driven Animation”. This time I am trying out Cavarly. Next time? Who knows… :) I have been a huge fan of Cavalry since I have discovered it couple of month ago. And here it is. Finally a possibility to add audio to nifty motion graphics: Since version 2.1 Cavalry supports the incredible Sound Behaviour which makes it super smooth to create reactive animations.
